sentences.sContent: He was a kilometre out from home when the storm struck.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was a kilometre out from home when the storm struck.
sentences.sCn: 暴风雨袭来时他离家有一公里远。

sentences.sContent: They ran to the main road and on for a kilometre until ambulances could reach them.
sentences.sContent_eng: They ran to the main road and on for a kilometre until ambulances could reach them.
sentences.sCn: 接着他们就向大道跑去，到了以后再跑了一千米，直到碰到救护车。

sentences.sContent: Every cubic kilometre of the ring contains around 20 tiny particles of dust, making it so tenuous, it would be invisible from the inside.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every cubic kilometre of the ring contains around 20 tiny particles of dust, making it so tenuous, it would be invisible from the inside.
sentences.sCn: 这个光环每立方公里含有约20颗尘埃微粒，结构非常稀薄，站在光环内部都看不见它本身。

trans.tranOther: a unit for measuring distance, equal to 1,000 metres
